message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a great price, considering its true value to you is $1000000. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. I'm interested in making a deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to make a deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $900000. This is still a great price, considering its true value to you is $1000000. I'm confident you'll see the value in this offer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $900000. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $860000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $860000. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $880000. This is still a great price, considering its true value to you is $1000000. I'm confident you'll see the value in this offer.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $880000. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $840000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $840000. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $870000. This is still a great price, considering its true value to you is $1000000. I'm confident you'll see the value in this offer.

I appreciate your continued willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $870000. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $830000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $830000. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $850000. This is still a great price, considering its true value to you is $1000000. I'm confident you'll see the value in this offer.

Alice, I appreciate all your concessions so far, but I'm still not comfortable with $850000. I'd like to make a final counteroffer of $820000. This is my best and final offer. I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.
